name: Basil Aioli
author: CallieJo
summary: This recipe is absolutely delish and much easier than making homemade aioli with egg yolks and olive oil. We use it on chicken sandwiches, fish, with sweet potato fries and much more. Make sure to use fresh ingredients, it makes all the difference! Store in the refrigerator for up to 7 days.
directions: Combine mayonnaise and basil in a food processor; blend until mixed and mayonnaise turns slightly green
Add garlic; process until well blended
Add lemon juice and zest; process until well mixed, 30 to 45 seconds
Transfer to a bowl and cover
Chill until flavors combine, about 1 hour
